duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in invasive cardiology procedures in various labs and units, preparing and organizing instruments, supplies, and equipment.
Record and document patient information, monitor patient conditions, and assist in movement of cath lab imaging equipment.
Perform therapeutic interventions consistent with cath lab procedures, assemble, operate, and troubleshoot equipment for various procedures.
Communicate with peers and health care team about clinical priorities for care, provide information to patients and families, and initiate problem solving and conflict resolution skills.
Participate in continuing education, prepare drugs for physician use, and perform other related projects and duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Associates degree in Cardiovascular Technology or allied health field of study including Paramedic Medicine
